chapters.title: Prologue: Glimmers of the Pattern
chapters.info: Mistress Beldair, p. 82 (84)—Chief cook in an inn in Cairhien where Samitsu stayed for a while. She is stout and tall for a Cairhienin, nearly as tall as Samitsu. She has gray hair. She also greeted Ledar and Underhill upon their arrival.
